verses.text: Ix syamanxioch winhaj Job yalan icha tik:
Comonoc wal syal in k'ochxi icha wajtaxon t'a yalanhtaxo ayic te tanhwab'il in yuj Dios.
Ayic syak'an sakil k'inal Dios t'ayin, wach' in ek' t'a kal k’ik’ k’inal,
tek'an anima in, chequel wal skolwaj Dios yet' tastac ay t'ayin.
Aynhejek' Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil chi' wed'oc, haxo heb' wuninal, oyanoch heb' t'a in patic.
Ha t'a jun pekti’ chi', manhxo jantacoc yal yim nok' in wakax yet' nok' in chiwa tz'elta. Ha te' oliwo awab'il t'a kaltac k'een, manh jantacoc aceite swik' t'a te'.
Ayic tzin k'och b'aj smolb'ej sb'a heb' yajalil chonhab', tzin em k'ojan t'a in xila t'a skal heb'.
Ayic tzin yilan heb' kelemtac, sb'es sb'a heb', haxo heb' ichamtac winak sk'e linhan heb' ayic tzin k'ochi.
Ha heb' yajal chonhab', numan tz'aj heb', syak' yechel heb' yic numan tz'aj juntzanhxo heb'.
Ha heb' yajalil chonhab', k'unxonhej slolon heb', manhxa tas syal heb'.
Ayic tzin yilan heb', syab'an heb' tas swala', syalan wach' lolonel heb' t'a in patic,
yujto tzin kolwaj t'a heb' manhxa smam yet' t'a heb' meb'a', aton heb' malaj junocxo mach scolan t'a skal yaelal.
Ha heb' wan scham yuj mheb'ail, syak' yuj diosal heb' t'ayin, haxo heb' ix chamnac yetb'eyum, stzalaj heb' ix yuj in colwal.
Ha tojolal yet' wach'k'olal aynhejoch t'ayin, ichato in pichul yajochi.
In och yet' heb' max uji yilani yet' heb' max uji sb'eyi.
Icha mamab'il waj t'a heb' ay stzapan smajanil. Tzin colan pax heb' max yal scolan sb'ha t'a yichanh heb' yajal, wach'chom manh wojtakoc heb' palta tzin colnhej heb'.
Swik'el yopisio heb' ixtum anima, tzin colankanel heb' ayoch t'a yol sk'ab' heb'.
Ha in naani to te niwan tiempo ol wila'', icham animail ol ik'an in cham t'a in ch'at.
Ha t'a jun pekti’ chi' lajan in icha junok te te' awab'il t'a sti' junok ha ha', a sk'ab'tac te' schaan yal ak'wal tz'emi.
Wach' syutej heb' anima in yak'an b'inajoc, ichato junjun k'u tz'ochnhej wip in colan in b'a.
Masanil anima smaclan yab' tas swala', numan tz'aj heb' yab'an in razón.
Ayic slajwi in lolon chi', schanhej sk'ol heb' smasanil. Wach'nhej syab' heb'.
Snib'ej wal heb' syab' in lolonel chi', icha wal snib'an nhab' heb' munlajwum t'a waresma.
Ayic tzin tzewaj yet' heb', tz'och k'elan heb', ijan wal max schalaj heb', max stzuntzejcotlaj wowal heb'.
Swak'och wopisio t'a skal heb', swalani tas yowalil sk'ulej heb', icha junok rey tz'ak'an mandar t'a skal heb' soldado. Ayic ay scusk'olal heb', swak' sniwanil sk'ool heb'.
